name: Vacant Property Letter
content:
Dear {{first_name}},

My name is [Your Name] with [Your Company], and I'm writing regarding your vacant property at {{property_address}}.

I've noticed that this property has been unoccupied for some time, and I wanted to reach out to express my interest in potentially purchasing it. As a real estate investor specializing in revitalizing vacant properties, I can offer a straightforward process with the following benefits:

• Cash offer with no financing contingencies
• Flexible closing timeline to accommodate your needs
• Purchase in as-is condition - no repairs or cleanup required
• Coverage of all closing costs

Vacant properties can become a financial burden with ongoing maintenance, taxes, insurance, and potential liability issues. I'd be happy to discuss how I might be able to take this responsibility off your hands while providing you with a fair value for the property.

Please contact me at [Your Phone Number] or [Your Email] if you're interested in exploring this opportunity further.

Thank you for your consideration.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
[Your Company]
